title: Encounter API Routes
description:
Create RESTful API Endpoints for Encounter Management

Implement a complete set of REST API endpoints for managing encounters with proper HTTP method usage, request/response handling, and comprehensive input validation.

Requirements:
- Implement standard CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for encounters
- Use appropriate HTTP methods: POST (create), GET (read), PUT/PATCH (update), DELETE (remove)
- Define clear URL structure following REST conventions (e.g., /api/encounters, /api/encounters/:id)
- Add input validation for all request payloads (required fields, data types, format constraints)
- Return appropriate HTTP status codes (200, 201, 400, 404, 500, etc.)
- Implement error handling with consistent error response format
- Add request body schema validation (consider using a validation library)
- Support query parameters for filtering/pagination on list endpoints
- Ensure proper Content-Type headers (application/json)
- Include basic authentication/authorization checks if applicable
- Document expected request/response formats for each endpoint
- Add unit tests for validation logic and edge cases
